meta.name: description
meta.content: The Colts Neck community takes great pride in their commitment to providing a comprehensive instructional program for all students. Our preschool through grade 8 curricula is broad and responsive to the range of talent that exists within the children of our district.

li.a: 13 Things School Board Members Wish People Knew About Them - "School Leader, 2019 November/December"

What Makes Colts Neck School District So Great?

img.h1: Colts Neck Township School District Home

center.br: In accordance with the Governor's Executive Orders regarding the closure of all parks in the State of New Jersey, the district's playgrounds are closed until further notice. Unfortunately, this extra precaution is deemed necessary under the current State of Emergency.

tr.td: Our Mission is to empower and inspire students to be confident, creative, self- sufficient learners who maximize their strengths and talents and contribute as responsible participants in their ever expanding world.

div.div: Colts Neck Township School District is a place where learning is engaging, individualized, inspirational and meaningful for all members of the school community at all times.

div.br:
Community: dynamic partnerships with the greater community
Academic: curricular and co-curricular programs that are student centered and encourage all participants to question, take risks and innovate

div.div:
Physical Environment: safe, inviting and stimulating
Professional Learning:paramount to creating a culture that improves instructional practice
Technology:support and enhance the Vision and contribute to the effective and efficient operation of the district.

div.div: Feel free to like/comment, but we don't reply on social media. Call the school with questions/concerns. Comments should be in good taste, respectful toward individuals/organizations & demonstrate proper decorum. Comments not following the rules of the road are subject to removal.
